survey_name: Employee Feedback on Workplace Ergonomics Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the current state of workplace ergonomics and identify areas for improvement to enhance comfort and productivity.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ergonomic setup of your current workstation?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ergonomic setup of your current workstation?

questions.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic issues have you experienced in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Ensure the 'None of the above' option is exclusive.

script.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic issues have you experienced in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What additional ergonomic equipment or adjustments would improve your workstation comfort?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture specific suggestions. Limit response to 200 characters.

script.question_text: What additional ergonomic equipment or adjustments would improve your workstation comfort?

questions.question_text: Have you received any ergonomic training or guidance from your employer?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to gauge awareness of employer-provided ergonomic resources.

script.question_text: Have you received any ergonomic training or guidance from your employer?

questions.question_text: How often do you take breaks to stretch or move around during your workday?
questions.client_notes: Measure frequency of breaks to assess ergonomic habits. Use a single-choice format.

script.question_text: How often do you take breaks to stretch or move around during your workday?
